name: df-cgra
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(ccgra, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wsbc(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s4, cfv(chlg, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))), wrex(s5, cv(s3), wrex(s6, cv(s3), w3a(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(ccgrg, cv(s0)), cs3(cv(s5), cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s6))), wbr(cv(s5), cfv(cv(s4), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), cfv(cv(s2), nat0)), wbr(cv(s6), cfv(cv(s4), cfv(cv(s2), nat1)), cfv(cv(s2), nat2)))))))))))
comment: Define the congruence relation between angles. As for triangles we use "words of points". See ~ iscgra for a more human readable version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jul-2020.)
